skills.name: Swing
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a whip, decreasing the enemy's Attack Speed for 2 turns with a 50% chance. The damage increases according to Attack Speed.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skills.name: Fast Swing
skills.description: Attacks 3 times in a row and inflicts Continuous Damage for 2 turns if you land a Critical Hit. The damage also increases as your Attack Speed increases.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Devil's Whip
skills.description: Attacks an enemy 4 times, decreasing the Attack Bar by 30% with a 75% chance for each attack. This attack is guaranteed a stun for 1 turn if the enemy's Attack Bar is depleted.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns
